attributes.action: Shouldn’t MP’s and Ministers Pay, Working Conditions and Pensions be brought into line and linked with the other public sector workers.
attributes.additional_details: At this time of hardship and belt-tightening shouldn’t MP’s and Ministers lead from the front and bring their Pay, Working Conditions and Pensions into line with the other public sector workers and then link their increases with what they say is adequate for the other public sector works.
